captions.text: HI SUHYUN fall in love at first sight with BOBBY, who moves in next door
They both try to impress him
But realize in the end that he has a girl friend… a cute love story
You have these original charms,
It’s important that you show them
It’s my first attempt at acting
And acting… doesn't seem to be my thing
My role is a little perverted. That’s what the director asked for
I think the director is the actor
I can’t catch up to that
I’m letting go of myself
I’m slowly getting used to it
I think I have that thing (?) inside me
She is so affectionate
It was unexpected
She laughs a lot and she is playful
So it was easy for us to get along through this acting (in this music video)
BOBBY is so mischievous
We admit that we both are
SU HYUN and I are like thread and needle
We show perfect synergy!!
I didn’t know what you meant!
I feel like I have one more brother
Please look after my little sister
CHAN HYUK : Please have this… / BOBBY : Thank You
CHAN HYUK : No problem… / BOBBY : Oh, you’re my senior!
CHAN HYUK : The more popular person is superior… / BOBBY : lol!
Nah~ I don’t want to swap
I just want both of them to be my brothers
I hope it turns out nicely
You’re feeling good?
Yes! I feel great! I had a nap-
We should be nice to him
He didn’t sleep at all
I feel embarrassed saying this
But I am so grateful of BOBBY
I’m so thankful that he helps us so much!!
BOBBY helped us once
So whether it be iKON or BOBBY
I’ll help any time they need me
I’m like… I’m like…
Anyway…
I’ll try and keep my promise
SU HYUN you have to cut me some slack-
Oh yes yes!! I was so into it-
I’m dying here-
You are a really rough driver-!
I’m like the BEST DRIVER of bumper cars
I had so much fun- I’m so happy-
My expectations are high
I have no idea at all of how it will turn out

comments.author: Gabrielle Alicia Munoz

comments.text:
maybe it's just me but idk y I feel there's triangle love (like?!) going on 
here!  
Suhyun->Bobby-><--Hi
I know I'll sound creepy but here's y I got that feeling:   
1:28 how bobby looked at Hi (but she felt shy to look at him back while he 
was talking) and how Suhyun stared at him when she saw that ... 1:40 how 
Suhyun couldn't help herself but laugh when Bobby was touching her face but 
Bobby was like " y r laughing at / what's wrong with u?!!" coz obviously 
there's no reason for laughing ( maybe it was ticklish for her idk!) nd how 
she ALWAYS stare at him while he's talking or he's around, 2:24 Bobby 
already told Hi that he couldn't sleep... ummm interesting!!! 3:18 Bobby 
couldn't keep looking at Hi cuz their were too close to each other... what 
Bobby! nervous ^_^? at 3:27 Hi didn't stop looking at Bobby while he was 
dancing... 3:40 arghhhh!!! that grabbing, but what did most killed me is at 
3:44 how he stared at her fooling around Gaaawwdddd!!! R.I.P poor me -_- I 
love both of them nd I found them both cute nd lovely girls nd I know 
Suhyun - Hi are friends... I don't want to sound mean but it looks like 
Suhyun a little bit jealous of Hi! she keeps copying what Hi's doing and 
agree with her 0:43 0:48 3:09 1:08  especially at 1:28 when she looks at 
Bobby nd he was looking at Hi nd she tried so hard to smile after that, how 
she answered Hi when she told her they need to be nice to Bobby she was 
like "(huh!) why?" ... she looks to me a little bit upset cuz obviously Hi 
took the whole attention with her surprising personality but I can 
understand her though!... idk maybe I'm wrong nd maybe it's just my fantasy 
imagination but still love them all and still watching the cutest MV ever' 
<3﻿
